property.name: node.environment
property.description: The name of the environment. All Presto nodes in a cluster must have the same environment name.

property.name: node.data-dir
property.description: The location (filesystem path) of the data directory. Presto will store logs and other data here.

property.name: plugin.config-dir
property.description: Configuration directory for plugins. This is where you should place connector property files.
